content.rendered:
• IG Account Outreach – 1000+ Follow-ups + 3 Backup pages (500+ follow-ups)
  • LinkedIn/Email/3 Additional Outreach (TikTok, X, Facebook, or more emails/LinkedIn profiles) – Daily outbound messages/connections
  • Email & SMS Marketing
  • Highest Level SEO + additional backlinking & reputation support or Highest Level Ad Management on 3 platforms
  • Website or DFY Community Build out
  • Press Release (5 Articles, 4 TV, and 4 Podcast Placements)
  • Business Audit: Rev Scaling, CRO, Going Viral, Team Building, Technology, Offer Building, and Management Consulting (5 (1 HOUR 15 MIN CALL)
  • CRM Build Out
  • 90 Video Edits + 45 Graphic Designs (individual graphics or carousels)
  • Social posting + caption management on 3 Instagram pages + TikTok + X
  • Full Video Training (200+ Videos)
  • Private Community Group

Continued on a 3 month basis or custom plan generated (follow-up call in 3 months).
